holidays.title: National Potato Day
holidays.description: National Potato Day on August 19th is the perfect chance to celebrate the most diverse of vegetables.

holidays.title: World Humanitarian Day
holidays.description: World Humanitarian Day honors humanitarian aid workers all over the world.

holidays.title: Afghanistan Independence Day
holidays.description: Get your dancing shoes ready as we celebrate this day with merriment.

holidays.title: Crown Princess Mette-Marit's day
holidays.description: Learn more about the day by celebrating it with the ethos promoted by the Crown Princess.

holidays.title: International Bow Day
holidays.description: Prepare your bow as we appreciate one of the world's most popular fashion accessories.

holidays.title: International Geocaching Day
holidays.description: Prepare yourself for the holiday that evokes the excitement of classic treasure hunts.

holidays.title: International Homeless Animals Day
holidays.description: The International Society for Animal Rights introduced the day to spread awareness about pet overpopulation.

holidays.title: International Orangutan Day
holidays.description: Let’s demonstrate our compassion for orangutans today by pledging to conserve these endangered species.

holidays.title: National Aviation Day
holidays.description: We feel the need for speed on National Aviation Day!

holidays.title: National Patient Advocacy Day
holidays.description: We notice and appreciate the medical professionals that advocate for their patients.

holidays.title: National Photography Day
holidays.description: Prepare your camera as we honor one of the most influential days in history.

holidays.title: National Soft Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: Soft ice cream pops up in the happiest of places, and has a fascinating history too!

holidays.title: Revolution Commemoration Day
holidays.description: It is time to hoist the Vietnamese flag high as we celebrate the end of oppression.

holidays.title: Saviours of the Apple Feast Day
holidays.description: It’s impossible to get into the church. Knots of apples float overhead on this day!

holidays.title: World Honey Bee Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the importance of the honey bee on this special day!

holidays.title: World Photo Day
holidays.description: The definition of photography is quite literally "drawing the light."

holidays.title: Bill Clinton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Bill Clinton is a name that’s synonymous with empowerment and prosperity in the U.S.

holidays.title: Brock O'Hurn’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented American actor, model, and fitness trainer, nothing is getting in his way.

holidays.title: Coco Chanel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Coco Chanel paved the road for fashion designers to bring their ideas to life.

holidays.title: Emmi Butler’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber is creating her legacy and success one upload at a time.

holidays.title: Ethan Cutkosky’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hard work has paid off for this talented T.V. actor with a big heart.

holidays.title: Fat Joe’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper just doesn’t quit releasing hits after hits, and luckily, he doesn’t plan to.

holidays.title: John Deacon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This bass guitarist, electronics whizz, and music writer is a triple threat.

holidays.title: Matthew Perry’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s so much more to the man you know simply as Chandler Bing.

holidays.title: Nate Dogg’s Birthday
holidays.description: From 213 to 2pac and 50 Cent, for Nate Dogg, rap wasn’t a numbers game.

holidays.title: Noel Miller’s Birthday
holidays.description: This hilarious comedian and YouTuber has tried his hand at many different things and succeeded.

holidays.title: Tayler Holder’s Birthday
holidays.description: From motocross racing to singing Christmas music, Tayler Holder seems to succeed in just basically everything.
